title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
Product Name: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candles, Soy Wax Tin Candles, Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend

Description:

Treat your loved ones to a delightful sensory experience with our Set of 16 Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candles. These exquisite candles, made from natural soy wax, are infused with essential oils, offering a wide variety of 16 distinct scents. This collection includes Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Bluebell, Wood Sage & Sea Salt, Peony Cherry Blossom, and English Pear & Freesia.

Each candle, weighing 2.5oz, is encased in a charming tin can, making it a perfect portable gift for your mother, wife, daughter, or friend. Not only are these candles perfect for gifting, but they also serve as excellent home decorations. The tin cans can be repurposed as flower pots or used in creative DIY projects after the candle has burned out.

Speaking of burn time, each candle offers a generous 18-20 hours of aromatherapy, filling your space with a pleasant and soothing fragrance. The natural soy wax ensures a clean and even burn, while the addition of essential oils enhances the therapeutic benefits.

Safety is our priority. Please remember to keep these candles out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire.

Moreover, our commitment to sustainability means that these tin cans are fully recyclable. Once the candle has burned out, you can recycle the tin can, making this product an eco-friendly choice.

Experience the joy of giving with our Set of 16 Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candles. Each candle is a thoughtful gift that brings warmth, comfort, and relaxation to any space. Order now and spread the joy of aromatherapy with your loved ones.
